address: Land At 19 21 And 23 Harper Road 325 Borough High Street And 1-5 And 7-11 Newington Causeway London
proposal: Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment to provide a mixed-use development comprising purpose-built student residential rooms (Sui Generis), affordable residential dwellings (Use Class C3), employment floorspace (Use Class E(g)), together with access, cycle parking, hard and soft landscaping and other associated works.

address: Plot M0121, Lower Riverside, Greenwich Peninsula, Greenwich
proposal: Residential development on Plot M0121, including provision of private and communal amenity space, car parking and cycle parking, servicing and access, public realm, hard and soft landscaping

Use of the building as a golf centre including a driving range across ground and lower ground floors, ground floor restaurant, bar facility and events space, and lower ground floor bar and restaurant facility and mini golf area, together with regrading and resurfacing of driving range, resurfacing of gravel car park with permeable hard standing, provision of a total of 130 car parking spaces (10 disabled and 10 electric vehicle charging points), increase in hours of operation, removal of floodlights to driving range and replacement low level lighting, and speakers to driving range
